meanings.definition: The practice or principle of complete abstinence from alcoholic drinks.
meanings.sent1: Her commitment to teetotalisms meant she never touched a drop of alcohol.
meanings.sent2: Many people follow teetotalisms to stay healthy and clear-minded.
meanings.sent3: At the party, his teetotalisms made him the designated driver.
meanings.sent4: His teetotalisms were like a shield against the temptations of the night.
meanings.sent5: Teetotalisms became her guiding light in a world of excess.

meanings.definition: The belief in or advocacy of teetotalism.
meanings.sent1: His strong teetotalisms led him to speak out against alcohol consumption.
meanings.sent2: The teetotalisms movement gained momentum in the community.
meanings.sent3: Their teetotalisms made them the odd ones out at the wine tasting event.
meanings.sent4: In his heart, the teetotalisms burned bright like a flame.
meanings.sent5: The teetotalisms of the group inspired others to reconsider their habits.

meanings.definition: The state of being a teetotaler.
meanings.sent1: After years of drinking, he embraced teetotalisms and never looked back.
meanings.sent2: Her teetotalisms brought a sense of clarity and purpose to her life.
meanings.sent3: The teetotalisms of the family made gatherings a sober affair.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet of the morning, his teetotalisms felt like a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: Teetotalisms enveloped him like a protective cloak against temptation.
